alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:51PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Scott and north central Polk Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 451 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beauchamp, or 9 miles north of Mena, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Acorn... Y City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations
